articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Former South Africa skipper hints at return for T20 World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Former South Africa skipper Faf du Plessis has revealed he is considering a comeback to international cricket in time for next year's ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
articles.content: Former South Africa skipper Faf du Plessis has revealed he is considering a comeback to international cricket in time for next year's ICC Men's T20 World Cup.Du Plessis hasn't played an international… [+2837 chars]
